name: Phasio Pte. Ltd.
description: Developer of digital manufacturing platform designed to make operations nimble and efficient at scale for SME (small-to-medium enterprise) businesses. The company makes ordering parts, designing parts, and communicating with customers seamless, enabling clients to maximize productivity.
one_liner: Developer of digital manufacturing platform designed to make operations nimble and efficient at scale for SME (small-to-medium enterprise) businesses. The company makes ordering parts, designing parts, and communicating with customers seamless, enabling clients to maximize productivity.
